snippet.title: Memento Dawn - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Memento Dawn on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2319360/Memento_Dawn/

Memento Dawn is a colorful puzzle game in which players can control light and shadow to help the girl find a way to regain her memories. Follow her journey through a beautiful land where her memories are kept and help her answer the hidden mysteries.

More Details. https://mementodawn.com/

Composer: Quentin Charbit | https://www.instagram.com/quentincharbit/

#indiegames #puzzlegame #cozygames
